channel.title: Looking for a rsc coder
channel.description: Hi,We are currently working on a new website to house both a rsc and rs2 server. We have a rs2 coder but are struggling to find a rsc one. We have everything we need to make a success of this accept a rsc coder. We are looking for a mature person to come join our ever growing team. If you would ike to meet the rest of our team, please add me to msn - JDR785@live.co.uk

item.title: Looking for a rsc coder
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

darscape:

Isn’t this against the rules anyway - offering to host servers?

Indeed, well it certainly isn’t a development anyway…

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a rsc coder
item.dc:creator: @darscape darscape
item.description:
@darscape wrote:

aka

“i gota $15 vps from xxx so come and code so i can hav a server. i hav no idea how 2 code but i hav a paypel”

Isn’t this against the rules anyway - offering to host servers?

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a rsc coder
item.dc:creator: @Everyonedies Everyonedies
item.description:
@Everyonedies wrote:

We will host it and the coder will have server access.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a rsc coder
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Everyonedies:

We aint taking credit for anyones work. For all we care there name could be plastered all over it. We just need someone to maintain it and keep it running smooth.

So you want them to code it and run it?

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a rsc coder
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

RSCShadow:

Usually people make RSC servers because they want to, and would like to project their creativity. You on the other hand just want people to do it for you…

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a rsc coder
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

Usually people make RSC servers because they want to, and would like to project their creativity. You on the other hand just want people to do it for you…

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a rsc coder
item.dc:creator: @Everyonedies Everyonedies
item.description:
@Everyonedies wrote:

Thanks for the advice. We may have found someone. But this is a huge project we are working on and investing quite abit of money into most areas. If the right one comes along i will be very greatful

*** Edit, we dont have a coder, he fell threw. We need seperate coders for each so we can develope them both.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a rsc coder
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

[quote=“Shob, post:5, topic:328990”][quote author=Everyonedies link=topic=425376.msg3124054#msg3124054 date=1265846306]
We aint taking credit for anyones work. For all we care there name could be plastered all over it. We just need someone to maintain it and keep it running smooth.
[/quote]

I am sorry for my first comment then. Most people come here expecting to find a coder to supply there server with updates and maintain it while not giving them any credit. I wish you luck in your search for a coder but it might be quite hard considering the state of the RSC coding community.[/quote]
This everyone worth having is doing their own thing. Best bet is still having your rs2 guy figure things out.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a rsc coder
item.dc:creator: @Shob Shob
item.description:
@Shob wrote:

Everyonedies:

We aint taking credit for anyones work. For all we care there name could be plastered all over it. We just need someone to maintain it and keep it running smooth.

I am sorry for my first comment then. Most people come here expecting to find a coder to supply there server with updates and maintain it while not giving them any credit. I wish you luck in your search for a coder but it might be quite hard considering the state of the RSC coding community.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a rsc coder
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

why not just have the rs2 coder learn to do things in rsc. He might even learn something. Rs2 servers have some of the shittiest programming ive ever seen. Allow him to try and fiddle with the rsc source, see if he can learn, thats your best bet. Not many people here are willing to join up with someone when they are doing all/most of the work.

Read full topic

We aint taking credit for anyones work. For all we care there name could be plastered all over it. We just need someone to maintain it and keep it running smooth.

item.dc:creator: @Shob Shob
item.description:
@Shob wrote:

Are you serious? Wow there are so many coders here just waiting for somebody to take credit for there work, looks like you hit the jackpot!
